welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Dedovsk, Russia! Get ready to be charmed by our picturesque city, known for its rich history and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Dedovsk has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving domestic and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving primarily Aeroflot and SkyTeam alliance flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: A modern and spacious terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving primarily international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving primarily international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: A new and modern terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi for up to 3 hours per day.
Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
